name: Mr. Langley
description: Langley, first name unknown, is a Caucasian American, considering Asuka is a quarter-Japanese, quarter-German (asKyoko Zeppelin Sohryu, Asuka's mother, is half-German, half-Japanese) and has American citizenship.Nonetheless, Asuka talks with her stepmother on the phone in German,and is mentioned to have come from Germany before reaching Tokyo-3, so despiteKajiacting as her guardian, Langley likely speaks German and lives there. He is only seen for a brief moment in a flashback holding a child...

name: Armisael
description: Armisael initially appears as a rapidly revolving ring of light, double-helical in form, which may represent aPlasmidWP. Itspatterncycles between blue and orange, from whichRitsuko Akagiconcludes that the Angel does not have a fixed form. The two helices eventually fuse together, and the ring severs at a single point to take on a thread-like form, several times longer than anEVA'sheight.

name: Marie Vincennes
description: Marie Vincennes(マリイ・ビンセンス,Marii Binsensu?) is a fictional character fromNeon Genesis Evangelion RPG: The NERV White Papergame.

name: Adovaquiel
description: This Angel is similar to a gigantic jellyfish. Its head has the shape of a bell, and many eyes are all over in it. From the lower part of the head hangs a structure with a rhomboidal shape, and several tentacles start at its side. Itscoreis not visible, possibly being inside it.

name: Rei Cinq
description: Rei Cinq is taller than the other Reis and does possess shorter hair, even when they were produced at the same time. She spent more time growing in the artificial womb, and her body had matured a bit—further than Trois or Quatre. Standing with the student group, she appeared to be a year ahead of them.She scoldsRei Sixfor embarrassing Shinji and Asuka tells the group that a first year asked Rei Cinq out in the hallway. She refused it gently saying she would feel bad if she didn't gave him a s...

name: Hajime Aida
description: Not much is known about Hajime, inEvangelion: 3.0+1.0 Thrice Upon A Time, it is revealed that he survived theNear Third Impactbut died in an accident, later. Kensuke laments that he should have spoken more with him, drank with him, and listened to his complains. Hajime's tomb is in a hill with a single tree on it. Other people's tombs are also on the same hill.

name: Commander Nikolayev
description: Commander Nikolayev(ニコラエフ司令官?) is a fictional character fromNeon Genesis Evangelion RPG: The NERV White Papergame.

name: Optimus Prime
description: Optimus Prime: Mode Eva is an Autobot that, after scanning the EVA-01, has acquired an appearance as imposing as anEvangelion, wearing the colors ofUnit-01. His cabin is mainly purple, associated with green forearms. The distinctive element of this shape is that the bust of Optimus Prime: EVA Mode can open and reveal the the Matrix of Leader with colors similar to thecoreof the EVA, while his right arm can transform into an energetic axe of reddish hue.

description: InNeon Genesis Evangelion: ANIMA, she is the third Rei after the previous one died in the battle againstArmisael. She is wad given a number as"Rei Trois"("trois" being French for "three") and is initially able to connect with other clones via a mental mirror toRei Quatre,Rei CinqandRei Sixas secondaries bodies. By doing this she could control them as extensions of her limbs, senses, and thoughts. This ability was a result of training rather than technology, and at the time, no known method ex...

name: Hideki Tama
description: Hideki is a pale-skinned man with an unusual hair style. LikeKoji, he is assigned to engineering. Not knowing theAAA Wundervery well, he can be seen with a lot of books when the ship takes off for the first time. He along with other crew members was surprised byMisato's order to fly and fight Nemesis series and was against it. However, the crew proceeded with the order, and he can be seen very surprised after the victory against theNemesis series. His personality seems to be shy but serious.

name: Misato Katsuragi
description: Misato Katsuragi(葛城 ミサト,Katsuragi Misato?) is one of the main characters from the Neon Genesis Evangelion franchise. She is the operations director atNERV, initially with the rank of captain; she is later promoted to major. Her duties at NERV include acting as a field commander for the EVA pilots, issuing orders and relaying battle strategies as well as processing input fromRitsuko Akagiand the technicians monitoring the EVAS. She also handles many bureaucratic aspects of NERV's operations.

name: Shinji Ikari/Rebuild
description: Shinji inRebuild of Evangelion, while mostly the same as his anime counterpart, comes across as somewhat more angry about his situation (although he isn't outwardly angry like his manga counterpart withSadamoto's take on the series). For instance, he calls out Misato and other members ofNERVas being selfish and bemoans the fact that he's "left feeling scared" when he and Rei have to pilot during theOperation Yashima battle. Somewhat similar to his feelings inThe End of Evangelion, Shinji real...

name: Lieutenant Colonel Clausewitz
description: He uses every opportunity during combat to gather information, sometimes choosing to use conventional weapons to see the effect on the enemy and then reorganize his strategies. He acts in a supportive manner towards Hikari when she isn't being controled. He promised Hikari to release her from the dummy plug control, however he couldn't completely turn it off since it would allow theQ.R. Signumtakes over Hikari's psyche. So he ordered it to be still be on in a lower setting, protecting her fro...

name: Kōzō Fuyutsuki
description: Kozo Fuyutsuki(冬月コウゾウ,Fuyutsuki Kōzō?) is a fictional character from theNeon Genesis Evangelionfranchise. He is second-in-command ofNERV HQandGendo Ikari's right hand man. As Deputy Commander ofNERV, Fuyutsuki frequently takes command of situations at the base whenever Gendo is away on business. Gendo also tends to unload the more mundane work, such as town council meetings, paperwork, and the like, onto Fuyutsuki.

name: Matarael
description: Matarael is a giganticopilinoidWP-like entity, with four immensely large legs (which are taller than most skyscrapers) and a relatively small body core. The many "eyes" on Matarael's central body are not actual eyes, but a camouflage pattern using mimicry to confuse its enemies, although the central eye at the bottom of its body appears to be real and functional, providing it with the sense of vision. The Angel secretes orange-colored corrosive acid from this central eye, which can burn throu...

name: Tōji Suzuhara
description: Tōji Suzuhara(鈴原 トウジ,Suzuhara Tōji?) is a fictional character from theNeon Genesis Evangelionfranchise. He is the Fourth Child (Fourth Children in the Japanese version), selected to be the pilot ofEvangelion Unit-03.

name: Third Angel
description: The Angel was excavated from permafrost (how it got there is not divulged) and captured bySEELE. Subsequently, it was contained in deep freeze inBethany Base's Cocytus facility, where it was subjected to thorough experimentation and analysis, eventually reduced to nothing more than "some bones", itscore, and mechanical additions. Most curious among the latter is thePseudo Entry Plug for Third Angel control test(第3使徒制御試験用擬似エントリープラグ,Dai 3 shito seigyo shiken-yō giji Entorī Puragu?) dangling fro...

name: Hajime Suruga
description: An engineer belonging to the first section of the NERV Technology Development Department. He is the he leader of a group who is dissatisfied with the treatment within NERV. He is also in charge of negotiations with SEELE (with the proxyHawk).

description: Quatre and several other Ayanami clones appear forming an international Anti-Angel hunting task force known as the "Sword of Damocles" network; formed on behalf of NERV with Rei II andRei No. Troisserving as leaders of the force. The later clones were produced at the same time and have nearly identical figures and appearances with the exception ofRei Six, who is physically only seven years old. To differentiate them, they were given different hair colors. Rei Quatre, the fourth clone, has sil...

It is preceded byGaghieland succeeded bySandalphon.

name: Arael
description: Arael(アラエル,Araeru?) (Hebrew: אראל) is the 15thAngel. Arael is notable for its ability to attack the human psyche directly through the application of its A.T. Field. Combined with its extreme range, Arael was one of the most dangerous Angels. It is preceded byZerueland succeeded byArmisael.

name: Satsuki Ooi
description: InNeon Genesis Evangelion: Gakuen Datenroku, Satsuki is one of the nuns in the NERV Academy during the day, but she is actually a NERV member as her real ocupation.

Ramiel becomes the first Angel to physically penetrate theGeofrontwhen its drill bit breaks through the armour. It is defeated duringOperation Yashima. It is preceded byShamsheland succeeded byGaghiel.

name: Starscream
description: The Angel-Scream is the result of the possession of anAngelby the ghost of the deceased Decepticon Starscream. His appearance remains similar to the one he had before, but he has a number of unique physical characteristics. His fingers lengthened and his shoulders took on the appearance of that of theFourth Angel. His cabin is entirely black and an Angel mask is visible on his bust. In this form, Starscream retains its personality. He is eager for power and keeps his memories, especially abou...

name: Mana Kirishima
description: She has short, brown hair. When she is not wearing her school uniform or pilot suit, Mana usually wears a white dress or a skirt. Her pilot's outfit consists of a gray jumpsuit that closes at the front with dark ranks. She also has a helmet, a bust and rigid beige glove. Attending the same school as the Evangelion pilots, Mana has the same uniform, consisting of a blue dress, white socks, and black shoes.

name: Porter
description: Belongs to the special agency NERV Security Intelligence Department. LikeHawk, he is a subordinate ofKyoya Kenzaki, and the name "Porter" is not his real name. Unlike Hawk, he does not betray Kyoya. He is a competent worker who can perform his duties properly.

name: Shinji Ikari
description: Shinji Ikari(碇シンジ,Ikari Shinji?)is the Third Child, the main protagonist of theNeon Genesis Evangelionfranchise, and the designated pilot ofEvangelion Unit-01. He is the son ofGehirnbioengineerYui IkariandNERVCommander (formerly Chief ofGehirn)Gendo Ikari. After his mother's death, he was abandoned by his father and lived for 11 years with hissensei, until he was summoned toTokyo-3to pilot Unit-01 against theAngels. He lives initially just withMisato Katsuragi; they are later joined byAsuka L...

name: Keel Lorenz
description: ChairmanKeel Lorenz(キール・ローレンツ,Kīru Rōrentsu?) is a fictional character from theNeon Genesis Evangelionfranchise. He is the enigmatic leader of the mysteriousSEELEorganization.

attributes.Voiceactor: Rick Peeples WP [ NGE ] Tom Booker WP [ D&R ] [ EoE ] D. C. Douglas WP (Neflix) Eng

name: Shigeru Aoba/ANIMA
description: Shigeru Aoba visits his university teacherProfessor Mizusatoin a stealth mission. Aoba asks Mizusato where are the copies you took of the quantum wave mirror blueprints and test data. Mizusato feigns ignorance, but Aoba keeps the pressure, saying that it was 4 years ago, when he entered NERV. He says thatRitsuko Akagiasked his opinion on quantum wave collapses. Aoba even mentions how scary the NERV's intelligence division as he continues to press for more information.

name: Dr. Katsuragi
description: In theEvangelion Detectivevideo game, Misato Katsuragi's father is still alive, his name isHideaki Katsuragi(葛城ヒデアキ,Katsuragi Hideaki?), he was voiced byShinji OgawaWP. In the game, he is actually an Angel (That looks like an Ultraman character). After transforming into a creature, he faces off against Evangelion Unit-01, Unit-00, and Unit-02. He is defeated and disappears in a ray of light.

name: Shinji Ikari/ANIMA
description: InNeon Genesis Evangelion: ANIMA, Shinji is now 17 years old. He apparently lets his hair grow, making him look like Ryoji Kaji. He also inherited the watermelon field of the latter. He first pilots theEvangelion Unit-01 Type F, but after the attack ofEvangelion Unit-0.0 (Quatre)and the subsequent unification of his soul with Unit-01, he pilots theSuper Evangelionand its various upgrades.
